title: Can you guys hotfix Nexus Sion?
body:
He can win without playing and being alive. It's pretty broken. Your coding has a bunch of conflicting issues regarding knowing if he is alive or not on this mode.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D28iayszGwI

replies.body:
I do not understand how that even happened. He was in Zhonyas form the whole time?  That was so confusing! This definitely need to be brought to light. (No pun intended)

Surprised they haven't Disabled Sion in Blitz. We all know they can .

> [{quoted}](name=Jinxsterr,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=c8K6eBH3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-21T19:03:01.339+0000)
>
> I do not understand how that even happened. He was in Zhonyas form the whole time?  That was so confusing! This definitely need to be brought to light. (No pun intended)
> 
> Surprised they haven't Disabled Sion in Blitz. We all know they can .

Basically the game is coded that he is alive if he is undead. However, the game tries to summon anyone who died before the match to make it fair. Therefore, the conflict of interest of the game coding occurred in which it determined Sion to be 'alive' when he was in fact dead.

It may or may not occur with Karthus as well. The difference is Sion actually has a targetable presence which may be part of the coding of how it works.

Update: It just revives Karthus.

> 
> It may or may not occur with Karthus as well. The difference is Sion actually has a targetable presence which may be part of the coding of how it works.
> 
> Update: It just revives Karthus.

Wow that's amazing. Definitely needs to be dealt with. Hopefully they will acknowledge it soon.

This doesn't seem like something that needs to be hotfixed, as it looks like a pretty specific sequence of events needs to happen. Are you sure it's an easily reproducable bug even, and not just a one time thing?
